Gameplay Instructions:

How to play:

Starting the Trivia Game:

  1. The user selects the filter on Instagram/download the Spark AR Filter File and taps on the screen to start the trivia.
  2. They will then be prompted with 3 sets of questions randomly to test them on their knowledge of Korea. 

Users will have 5 seconds to select an answer by tilting their head left or right.

Getting the answers correct/wrong:

  • KTO mascots will celebrate when the user gets the question correct, and lament when the user gets the question wrong.

Fun Facts time!

  • When the game ends, fun facts pop up to give the user an interesting fact about South Korea.
  • It educates users about some lesser known facts of Korea, the Korean culture and many more!

Expected Play duration:

Play time would be around 2-5 minutes. Once the user answers all the trivia questions, the game ends. Due to the simple mechanics, a short play duration would be more likely to retain the attention of the user.
